resources.string: When enabled, the name of the active geocoder will be also shown on the map overlay.
This will take you to another settings screen, from which you should change the "Address Provider" option.
Used to authenticate for what3words geocoding. If empty, the what3words geocoder is disabled.
Used to authenticate for PositionStack geocoding. If empty, the PositionStack geocoder is disabled.
Used to authenticate for MapQuest geocoding. If empty, the MapQuest geocoder is disabled.
